item.title: FAQ
item.description: Frequently Asked Questions This FAQ hopes to answer some of the questions that a lot of blind users get from sighted people, as soon as they discover we’re blind. If your question isn’t answered here, feel free to ask us! If the answer is common to a lot of blind people, it will get added here. Q: How Do Blind People Use Computers? A: Some blind people are not totally without sight, and can read print just fine, if it’s enlarged.

item.title: Resources
item.description: Resources This is a non-exhaustive list of resources the OurBlind community has found helpful. It may grow in time and suggestions are appreciated. Accessibility Support Phone Lines You Should Know NFB free slate and stylus program NFB free white cane program Braille learning resources: UEB Online APH UEB Math Tutorial APH Nemeth Tutorial Share Braille - A platform for requesting completely free secondhand braille books from other individuals to keep forever and listing your own that you don’t need anymore.
